name: Cliffward March
role_in_state: frontline coastal defense and ship-repair hub
economy_niches: harbor augury booths for coastal navigation
limestone quarrying for ballast and masonry
pilotage and tolls at lee coves
culture_adjustments: practical seamanship prioritized over mercantile pageantry
strong cliff-watch and beacon traditions distinct from port epics
heavy use of pilot/watch pidgin vocabulary
guild oaths tied to coastal defense duties
seasonal cliff-festivals replace some inland port rituals
constraints: limited flat land for expansion due to sheer cliffs
scarce imported ritual reagents subject to maritime disruption
no high-pressure steam megainfrastructure (state tech constraint)
notes: hereditary pilot registers held by local guilds
augury booths concentrated at headlands for safe approach
